collation.p: 17 quires: i-ix8 (folios 1-72), x6 (folios 73-78), xi-xiii8 (folios 79-102), xiv4 (folios 103-105, 105a), xv-xvi8 (folios 106-121), xvii4 (folios 122-125). No catchwords.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Sefardi semi-cursive and square script, punctuated, of the 15th century.

decoDesc.decoNote: Numerous initial-word panels with penwork decoration and pen-flourishing, in red and mauve.

history.provenance: Acquisition: Adolphus Asher (b. 1800, d. 1853), Berlin bookseller and dealer to the British Museum 1841-1853: purchased by the British Museum from him on 12 June 1852: inscribed, folio [126v] (fse001v).
